svc@... wrote:

>
> Maybe =
meta.getDate() represents the same information as
> fetchBeginTimeStamp,
> =
but then I have the problem of converting the date to a long
>
meta.getDate=
() is the 14character string representation of fetch time;
its whats in the=
 ARC record metadata line.

You'll need to parse this 14 character represen=
tation.  There's
org.archive.util.ArchiveUtils#parse14DigitDate(String) whi=
ch will return
you a java.util.Date.  You could call #getTime() on the retu=
rned Date
instance to obtain a long.  Will that do you?

St.Ack

> I hope, =
anyone can help me here.
>
